casebody.data:
William BARISOFF, Robert I. Knudson, Hubert L. Dawson, Jr., and Arthur M. Lilly, Appellants, v. HOLLYWOOD BASEBALL ASSOCIATION, a Corporation, Ap-pellee. No. 11706. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. April 5, 1948.

Before MATHEWS, BONE, and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the grounds and for the reasons stated in its opinion (71 F.Supp. 493), the judgment of the District 'Court is affirmed.
